content.rendered:
ASTR MISSION STATEMENT

The mission of the Southern Africa-Indian Ocean Division Office of Archives, Statistics, and Research is to: Organize, analyze and appropriately publicize historical documents and images, current statistics, and other vital organizational data of the Organization.
